title: COCONUT CURRIED PUMPKIN SOUP
directions: Add onion and garlic to mixer bowl, chop for 3 sec/speed 5/MC on. Scrape bowl down.
Add ghee, babas curry powder and garam masala. Cook for 5 min/100째C or 212 째F/speed 1/MC off.
Add carrot, sweet potato and pumpkin, chop for 10 sec/speed 6/MC on. Scrape bowl down.
Add chicken stock and cook for 30 min/100째C or 212째F/speed 2/MC on.
Add coconut cream and blend for 1 min/speed 9/MC on, increasing speed gradually. Repeat if required.
Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 30 g ghee or butter or olive oil
200 g sweet potato, peeled, roughly chopped
600 g liquid chicken stock or 600 g water + 1 tbsp chicken stock concentrate
